[[inst_hl_ldi_upo]]
==== HL.LDI.UPO

*Syntax:* hl.ldi.upo [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldi_upo.svg[HL.LDI.UPO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/POST_INDEX
